channel.title: Server Question
channel.description:
Alright, so i got a source and a client that's up and running and everything. [img]http://i26.tinypic.com/k3qces.jpg[/img]
I log on using my hamachi ip.
What's next? Do I just give my hamachi ip to my friends and let them join? I guess what I'm asking is how do I let others join.

item.title: Server Question

item.description:

Alright, so i got a source and a client that’s up and running and everything.
